title: Simple enough i need a word that i can call my teammates and not be punished.

embed.description: Easily capture screenshots, GIFs, and replays that are ready to share. Download the free app for windows and mac.

body:
i need a word that is gonna make me feel somewhat relived of my inner mental breakdown and flame em with because calling people dogshit keeps gettin me banned im not quite sure it was wrong to call it as you see it but w.e i guess people are aloud to be wrong...

no but seriously i lost my mental hard af in p2 playing vrs wut was suppose to be d3-d2 last season players playing like actual donkeys flame me if ya want i honestly dont care and hit me with the best flame word plz!
